name: AS_GCM_QNM_CPS_comparisonValueSelectionForMultiSelect
description: Component to display to pick the comparison value in the conditional logic grid for Dropdown and Radio button
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!responseOptions: ri!selectedTemplateQuestion[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.responseOptions],
  local!sortedResponses: rule!AS_GAM_UT_sortAnyData(
    data: local!responseOptions,
    field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response.responseTemplateId,
    ascending: true
  ),
  rule!AS_GCM_DPL_CO_dropdownField(
    label: "",
    required: true,
    choiceLabels: local!sortedResponses[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response.label],
    choiceValues: local!sortedResponses[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Response.value],
    /*Hiding the placeholder after the value is once selected since it is a required field */
    /*noPlaceholder: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!value),*/
    placeholder: "",
    value: ri!value,
    saveInto: ri!saveInto,
    validationGroup: cons!AS_GCM_QNM_TXT_VALIDATION_GROUP_ADD_QUESTION
  )
)
